title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 26.3 - Time of circularization
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 26.3 - Time of circularization

State Regulations

The notice of sale shall be mailed pursuant to section
26.2
of this Part not less than 8
nor more than 30 days before the date of the sale. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
26.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
